instructions: Swipe down on the notes list to reveal the search field. Tap the search field, then enter what you re looking for. You can also choose a suggested search, such as Notes with Drawings, then enter additional text to refine your search. If a note is locked, only its title appears in the search results. The search includes handwritten text (in supported languages), photos, and scanned documents.
Open the note you want to search. Tap the Share button , then tap Find in Note. Type the text you re looking for in the search field.
